name: Crazy Dead
description:
You need battle for meat.

use Left joystick por move, L1 for use barrier ability and use rigth control stick for special abilities.

you must put meat in your mausoleum, for 7 meats, your receive one ability for the next battle.

video game done for:

Luis Alcalá-Zamora Osuna: https://www.linkedin.com/in/luis-alcal%C3%A1-zamora-osuna/

and
